conversations.message:
You've just spent the night sleeping face-down in a pile of synth-spaghetti in a bar called Chatsubo. After rubbint the sauce out of your eyes, you can see Chiba sky through the window, the color of television tuned to a dead channel.
A PAX booth is on the wall. Ratz's prosthetic Russin arm whines as he wipes the bar. His teeth are a webwork of East Eurpoean steel and brown decay.

lines: I don't care if you eat that spaghetti or sleep in it, you still gotta pay for it. 46 credits.

options.line: Sorry, Ratz. I can't afford it. Want me to give it back?
options.response: Pay up, cyberscum. Use the PAX if you need money.

options.line: How about if I owe it to you? You can trust me.
options.response: Pay up, cyberscum. Use the PAX if you need money.

options.line: I'm ready for dessert. Have you got any pudding for me to sleep in?
options.response: Pay up, cyberscum. Use the PAX if you need money.

options.line: I'd like to sleep on it some more, if that's okay with you, Ratz.
options.response: You been sleepin' in that stuff all night. Now pay up or I call a lawbot.

conversations.message: Ratz refuses to take your credits.
lines: I said 46 credits, buckwheat. Are you deaf?
Thanks, friend artiste. Shin came by, but he didn't want to interrupt your beauty sleep. He still has your deck.

options.response: Your Yamamitsu UXB, Herr %name%. Shin says you pawned it at his shop.
One of Lonny Zone's girls was looking for you too. You got biz with Zone?
You are the artiste of the slighly funny deal, Herr %name%.

options.line: Zone's a close friend of mine. Did I hear something about the Health Department closing this place?
options.response: A minor problem, friend artiste. I'll be back in business within the week.

options.line: Anything else you want to tell me?
options.response: Better find a way to pay your bill at Cheap Hotel, or they'll start asking you to sell yout body parts.

options.line: So I sell a kidney or two. Why don't you get off my case, Ratz?
options.response: You should have fear, artiste. It may be your friend. Now get out of here before the lawbot arrives.
Good luck, artiste. You're going to need it.
